title: Will my Pixel 4a ever work reliably? About to do 3rd factory reset in 2 weeks.
content: Wifi and bluetooth will not turn on.  When I reset the phone I get a message that says System UI is failing asking if I want to wait.  A box flashes across the screen, like an error message, but I don't know even know where to find it.    I'm not too old for Android and haven't missed my iphone for 4 years.
